question: Which team won the Youth Olympic Games Qualifiers?
explanation: India's junior men's team held their nerves to beat Malaysia 2-1 in the shootout to win the Youth Olympic Games Qualifiers. The victory will give India a chance to participate in the Youth Olympic Games to be held in Buenos Aires in August. The tournament was played in new Hockey 5's format. In the women's final, India lost to China & they ended their campaign as runners-up.
